oh_hecc - package oh_hecc
All these classes are used within OH-HECC (Optional Help for HECC) to do stuff basically.
OH_HECC_IMAGES - Static variable in class utilities.ImageManager
Holds the icons used by OH-HECC's windows.
oh_hecc.game_parts - package oh_hecc.game_parts
This package basically holds the game parts for a HECCIN Game.
oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows - package oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows
These classes are here as a GUI to edit individual EditablePassage/EditableMetadata objects.
oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata - package oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata
Classes that allow the metadata info for a heccin game to be edited.
oh_hecc.game_parts.passage - package oh_hecc.game_parts.passage
Classes that represent the individual passages in a Heccin Game (and also allow them to be edited)
oh_hecc.mvc - package oh_hecc.mvc
Some model-view-controller bits for OH-HECC.
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits - package oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits
This package contains various objects used within the model that users can see/manipulate/interact with/etc.
OhHeccNetworkFrame - Class in oh_hecc.mvc
This class holds the JFrame which holds the View object responsible for showing the Model to the user
OhHeccNetworkFrame() - Constructor for class oh_hecc.mvc.OhHeccNetworkFrame
Constructs this object, albeit in the form of a frame, with the title 'OH-HECC!', that's invisible and contains nothing.
OhHeccNetworkFrame(JFrame) - Constructor for class oh_hecc.mvc.OhHeccNetworkFrame
A version of the constructor that uses a predefined JFrame instead (that it'll basically claim ownership of)
OhHeccNetworkFrame(JFrame, JComponent, ModelController) - Constructor for class oh_hecc.mvc.OhHeccNetworkFrame
Constructor that utilizes an existing JFrame and View instead, and calls all the setup stuff.
OhHeccParser - Class in oh_hecc

Creates the HeccParser object
OhHeccParserTest - Class in oh_hecc
